{"notifications":[{"id":8062,"message":"By order of the Governor's Office, Trico Schools will be closed for the reminder of the 2019 / 2020 School Year.

We will continue to engage our students using Remote Learning through May 22nd. 

Continue to check this website and Trico Facebook pages for updates.

Stay safe & keep learning!","type":"overlay"}]}

li.div: The mission of the district, in partnership with our communities, is to provide our students with unique educational experiences that prepare them for success in an ever-changing society.
To see all children reach their full and unique potential.

img.div:
A warm welcome to our new and returning students and families. The Trico School District is at the center of six great communities and is truly reflective of all the wonderful families that we are proud to call neighbors, family, and friends.
Every year, our outstanding faculty and staff is leading the way to prepare our students for the next grade level, building-level transition, military service, college, and successful career that will lead to a rewarding adult life. While we are making significant progress in adding instructional, emotional supports and academic opportunities, there remain learning gaps that continue to exist for some of our students. Eliminating these gaps is the issue that we are striving to address. As Superintendent of the Trico School District, I am personally and professionally committed to providing endless opportunities that allow each student to reach their full and unique potential.
Honestly, the best parts of my job are visiting with students, working alongside faculty and staff to create a learning atmosphere second to none, and collaborating with community members to further strengthen our partnerships. Thank you for the privilege of serving your family, your children and our community.
Sincerely,
Larry Lovel, Superintendent

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
